properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_DATE, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS='N'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_DATE , MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS='N' AND WITHDRAW_STATUS ='N' AND BOARD_NO=?
